title: Germany arrests five, saying they violated sanctions against Russia
summary_full: Prosecutors said the suspects ran an export network that sent more than 16,000 shipments worth more than $30 million to Russian customers, including arms manufacturers.
summary_public: Prosecutors said the suspects ran an export network that sent more than 16,000 shipments worth more than $30 million to Russian customers, including arms manufacturers.

DE.label: positive
DE.evidence: Germany arrests five, saying they violated sanctions against Russia

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: sent more than 16,000 shipments ... to Russian customers, including arms manufacturers
